argument.description: The certificate_id of the certificate. Find this value in sys.certificates; the CERT_ID (Transact-SQL) function will return it as well. cert_id has data type int.

description: This function returns the public portion of a certificate in binary format. This function takes a certificate ID as an argument, and returns the encoded certificate. To create a new certificate, pass the binary result to CREATE CERTIFICATE â€¦ WITH BINARY.
